import './InputForm.css' import {useState} from 'react' const InputForm = () => { const [currentSavings,setCurrentSavings]=useState(0); const [yearlyContribution,setYearlyContribution]=useState(0); const [expectedReturn,setExpectedReturn]=useState(0); const [duration,setDuration]=useState(0); const changeHandler=(id,event) => { console.log('change'); } return(

changeHandler("current-savings",event.target.value)} />

changeHandler("current-savings",event.target.value)}/>

); } export default InputForm;
